goal.en: Understand the modern reserch trend in chemistry and practice professional presentation
goal.ch: 培養學生瞭解現代化學研究與進行專業報告之能力

content.ch: 以口頭報告和交互討論進行

method.ch: 講授 研討 個別指導

grading.en: Based on student‘s presentation techniques and the knowledge of the topic he (or she) presents.
grading.ch: 依其報告之整體表現評分

en.competency: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
Be self-driven constantly to explore science.

ch.competency: 具備研究領域之專業知識
可規劃並執行專題研究，並將成果撰寫成論文發表
與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
自我鞭策不斷學習新知識

en: Department:MSc in Chemistry only.Year:First Year only.Student ID:odd numbers Only.
ch: 系所:限化學學系碩士班。年級:限一年級。學號:限單號。
